resources.string: It seems you don\'t have any detection history
Detect ingridient of your food and \nlet us inform to you if the products is safe for you
Sign in with your existing Google Account
How our app can detect hallal, \n potential diseases and potential allergies ?

We have dataset collected by Machine 
Learning team and model that can learn
from user input. After SafeBite app detect
some ingredients from Scan Feature, SafeBite
app will ask the model to learn the user input
and return information about hallal, potential
diseases and potential allergies based on
ingredients detected. But due to dataset
limitation, not all ingredients can be identified.

SafeBite developed to answer existing problems
 that make people in distress when avoiding
some ingridients out there due to allergies, disease
or hallal resctrictions
